name: sequential-clipboard
title: Sequential Clipboard
description: Sequential copy and paste using a queue system. Copy multiple items in order, then paste them sequentially - perfect for filling formssequential-copy
author: vinayak_nigam

commands.name: add-to-copy-queue
commands.title: Add to Copy Queue
commands.description: Copy current clipboard content to the queue

commands.name: paste-from-queue
commands.title: Paste from Queue
commands.description: Paste the next item from the copy queue

commands.name: show-copy-queue
commands.title: Show Copy Queue
commands.description: View all items currently in the copy queue

commands.name: clear-copy-queue
commands.title: Clear Copy Queue
commands.description: Remove all items from the copy queue

preferences.name: maxQueueSize
preferences.title: Maximum Queue Size
preferences.description: Maximum number of items to keep in queue (0 = unlimited)

preferences.name: showPreviewLength
preferences.title: Preview Text Length
preferences.description: How much text to show in previews

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
